answer: Velankanni Shrine is open daily for pilgrims from early morning till night. Darshan timings may extend during festivals and weekends.

questions: where is velankanni shrine located

answer: Velankanni Shrine is located in Velankanni town, Nagapattinam district, Tamil Nadu, India, along the Bay of Bengal coast.
